name: VivifyScrum 2 Dark (Color+)
description:
VivifyScrum 2 Dark Color +

A dark theme and optimised layout who work with the standard light vivify default theme.

 - Distinct color for all the columns of the backlog / sprint backlog.
 - Custom colors for tasks / bug / story / note / improvment.
 - Custom background for the board.

Latest update : 07/2018
additional_info:
Latest Changelog : 

2.0 
 - Now support the new version of Vivify who introduce company.
 - Custom textarea color by task type : Bug in red, Task in orange etc…

2.1
 - Now source code with <pre> balise (encapsuled by ```<code>```) have a dark background.
 - Now the license of this stylesheet is WTFPL : 


–––

1.5 Add color variation
1.4 
 - Improve column header with background colored (more easy to see where you are in horizontal scrolling)
 - Improve task background with two background for even and odd (more easy to see where you are in vertical scrolling).
1.3 Fix the markdown editor
1.2 Fix the white task
1.1 Fix modal size issue for multiple issue managing.
